bilingual.source: She has a strong interest in economics.
bilingual.target: 她对经济学有浓厚的兴趣。

bilingual.source: He majors in economics in graduate school.
bilingual.target: 他在研究生院主修经济学。

bilingual.source: She is pursuing a Master of Economics degree.
bilingual.target: 她正在攻读经济学硕士学位。

bilingual.source: She decided to major in economics at university.
bilingual.target: 她决定在大学主修经济学。

bilingual.source: Baer has written several books on economics.
bilingual.target: 贝尔写了几本关于经济学的书。
经济学帮助我们理解市场行为。

bilingual.source: Economics is the study of resource allocation.
bilingual.target: 经济学是研究资源分配的学科。

bilingual.source: She is majoring in economics and minoring in history.
bilingual.target: 她主修经济学，辅修历史。

bilingual.source: Braun has written several books on economics.
bilingual.target: 布劳恩写了几本关于经济学的书。

list.abstract: 经济学,经济的经济学的合算的有经济效益的

yingyinNormal.zh: 你学什么专业？经济学。我读的是经济学。

yingyinNormal.en: Hello, I'm behavioral economics. And I'm standard economics.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你好，我是行为经济学。我是标准经济学。

yingyinNormal.en: Yale, economics and baseball. You're funny, Pete.
yingyinNormal.zh: 耶鲁，经济学，棒球赛。皮特，你真有意思。

yingyinNormal.en: Economics in some sense is more optimistic about human nature.
yingyinNormal.zh: 标准经济学在某个程度上对人性的考虑更为乐观。

yingyinNormal.en: So the real goal of behavioral economics is to say when you study economics you study economics.
yingyinNormal.zh: 行为经济学真正的目标是当你研究经济学你就只研究经济学。

yingyinNormal.en: In reality, many people think of behavioral economics is being against classical economics.
yingyinNormal.zh: 现实当中很多人以为行为经济学和经典经济学是相违背的。

yingyinNormal.en: But when you come to policy, let's not just consider economics.
yingyinNormal.zh: 但当你要制定政策的时候你就不能只考虑经济学了。

yingyinNormal.en: Behavioral economics is at this point interested in the same question that economics is interested in, but without assuming that people are rational.
yingyinNormal.zh: 行为经济学和一般经济学所关心的问题是一样的，只是它假设人们是非理性的。

yingyinNormal.en: Because while economics has some value some explanatory power, it's not everything.
yingyinNormal.zh: 虽然经济学有一些价值，能够解释一些现象但它是不充分的。

yingyinNormal.en: The silver lining in all of these is that in standard economics there's nothing we can do to better the human condition.
yingyinNormal.zh: 在这当中我们仍存有一丝希望，在标准经济学中，人性已经没有可以提升的空间。

yingyinNormal.en: Have you remembered nothing? Recall the lessons of Adam Smith, the father of modern economics.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你们什么都不记得了吗？回想亚当·史密斯，现代经济学之父那课。

yingyinNormal.en: You got a kid in there that's got a degree in economics from Yale. You got a scout here with 29 years of baseball experience.
yingyinNormal.zh: 在你的身边那边是拥有耶鲁经济学位的高材生，这边却是拥有二十九年棒球经验的球探团队。

yingyinNormal.en: What the fuck is a synthetic CDO? Well, here's Dr. Richard Thaler, father of behavioral economics and Selena Gomez to explain.
yingyinNormal.zh: 综合债务担保是个什么鬼玩意？让行为经济学之父理查德·泰勒博士和赛琳娜·戈麦斯来给你解释。

yingyinNormal.en: And behavioral economics is a little bit depressing in a sense we would say people are myopic, easily confused, have emotions, don't know what they want and so on.
yingyinNormal.zh: 而行为经济学则较为消极，我们认为人们鼠目寸光，容易被迷惑，感情用事，不知道自己想要什么。

yingyinNormal.en: In medicine or economics, in technology or space, battle lines are being drawn.
yingyinNormal.zh: 无论在医药还是经济上，在科技或太空技术上，战线已经分明了。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: Regenerative products could be a hard sell, because the concept is tough to define quickly, says associate professor of agricultural <highlight>economics</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 农业经济学副教授说，可再生产品可能很难销售，因为这个概念很难快速定义。

examination_example.sentence: He quotes a giant of classical <highlight>economics</highlight>, Alfred Marshall.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他引用了古典经济学巨人阿尔弗雷德·马歇尔的话。

examination_example.sentence: How feasible it is to create new disciplines like computational <highlight>economics</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 创建像计算经济学这样的新学科是多么的可行。

examination_example.sentence: People with a growth mindset of interest were more likely to create new majors like computational <highlight>economics</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 具有兴趣增长思维的人更有可能创造新的专业，如计算经济学。

examination_example.sentence: The book is co-authored by Long Island University's philosophy professor Michael Soupios and <highlight>economics</highlight> professor Panos Mourdoukoutas.
